content: i was scrolling through facebook one day and i seen an advertisement from the clothing brand cider for a crochet balaclava this inspired me to make and design my own crochet balaclava so i can share it with you youtube video for this tutorial is now live to make you will need 3 x 100g balls of super chunky yarn in colour of choice 10mm crochet hook embroidery needle and scissors skill level - easy all patterns written using us terminology
